segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and she’s just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he’s about to fall backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is too close to the stool—if it tips, she might get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised no one has reacted yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s on the edge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floorboards if it keeps flowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this without feeling anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
